availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Erasmus Leonard (Washington County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of William Leonard and Rodah Leonard. Married to Lucinda Leonard. Father of Benjamin Leonard. Resident in Mercer County in 1850. Farm laborer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 324B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District 1, p. 63
Find A Grave, "Erasmus R. Leonard (December 27, 1835-January 13, 1897)," Memorial #49022217, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49022217 (accessed May 24, 2018).
